sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnclubuser ( clb_id , cmmnty_id , oprtr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , emplyr_id ) VALUES ( #clbId# , #cmmntyId# , #oprtrAt# , #sbscrbDe# , #secsnDe# , #useAt# , SYSDATE() , #frstRegisterId# , #emplyrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnclubuser SET clb_id = #clbId# , cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# , oprtr_at = #oprtrAt# , sbscrb_de = #sbscrbDe# , secsn_de = #secsnDe# , use_at = #useAt# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND clb_id = #clbId# AND cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnclubuser WHERE 1 = 1 AND clb_id = #clbId# AND cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT clb_id , cmmnty_id , oprtr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , emplyr_id FROM comtnclubuser WHERE clb_id = #clbId# AND cmmnty_id = #cmmntyId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#

SELECT clb_id , cmmnty_id , oprtr_at , sbscrb_de , secsn_de , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , emplyr_id FROM comtnclubuser WHERE 1=1
clb_id = #searchKeyword#
cmmnty_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY clb_id DESC , cmmnty_id DESC , emplyr_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnclubuser WHERE 1=1
clb_id = #searchKeyword#
cmmnty_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
